game.title: The Lost Treasure
game.objective: Find the hidden treasure in Elvenwood Forest.
game.description: The ancient map leads to a fortune beyond imagination. But beware, the forest is guarded by elven sentinels who will not let you pass without a challenge.

task.objective: Speak to Gildor Inglorion in Rivendell.
task.description: Find Gildor Inglorion in Rivendell and listen carefully to his instructions.
Search for the Old Elven Map in Rivendell Library.

task.objective: Deliver the map to Gildor Inglorion.
task.description: Return to Gildor Inglorion with the Old Elven Map and receive further instructions.

task.objective: Find the Treasure Chest in Elvenwood Forest.
task.description: Follow the clues on the map to find the treasure chest in Elvenwood Forest.
